name: alexandrie
description: Alexandrie is a Rust-based self-hosted crates registry, designed as an alternative to crates.io. It lets users host their own Rust package repository with search, publishing, and web browsing support, ideal for private package hosting.
features: Private Registry: Host your own Rust crates repository independently. Alternative to crates.io.
Package Publishing: Publish and manage Rust packages with cargo integration. Seamless workflow.
Search Functionality: Fast search across all hosted crates and versions. Find packages instantly.
Web Interface: Browse packages through clean, intuitive web UI. Easy package discovery.
Access Control: Manage who can publish and access your packages. Secure your proprietary code.
Version Management: Handle multiple versions and dependencies automatically. Reliable dependency resolution.
Built in Rust: Fast, safe, and reliable implementation in Rust. Performance you can trust.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your Rust package infrastructure. Your code, your server.
